parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: FirewallConfigureStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether VPC firewalls are configured. Valid values:

*   **notconfigured**: VPC firewalls are not configured.
*   **configured**: VPC firewalls are configured.
*   If this parameter is left empty, all policy groups of access control policies are queried.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 50.
